nodes.text: The Bontormia system was a star system that was located in the Bortele sector, within the Mid Rim and the Slice regions. The system was the origin point of the Bontormian klesplong musical instrument.
The Bontormia system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square R-8.
